verbs.description: The [V: lying] [ARG0: pair] of ignorant Trump supporters known as Diamond and Silk “ celebrated ” the pardoning of Alice Johnson by using the moment to attack basketball superstar LeBron James and the NFL players who # TakeAKnee .
